Key Arguments: The legislation has many flaws and potential for abuse.
It threatens democracy and freedom of speech.
The bill could lead to a loss of freedom to think and express oneself.
Truth is subjective and varies across cultures and time periods.
The bill could lead to unjust incrimination based on beliefs or allowing others to speak.
Notable Quotes: I think that pre-WW2 Germany would have loved it.
This is communism all over again.
Who is it that decides what is truth?
